message.raw:
Implemented correct plot auto-ranging and reset controls

Plots will now auto-scale when adding/removing a shot if they were already set to autoscale.
If the plot has been manipulated in one or more axes, the appropriate axis scale will not update when adding/removing shots
Two buttons have been added to reset the auto-range.

message:
